title: Civil War Defenses of Washington: Fees & Passes
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes         A park ranger is leading a group of visitors on an interpretation program at Fort Stevens. NPS  General Admission and Programs:   Admission to the Civil War Defenses of Washington is FREE.  All programs, historical education programs, and ranger-led programs are FREE.  Other Fee Information:  For information about permits, please visit the Permits & Reservations section. This includes permits for:    Picnic groves, athletic fields, weddings, research and special park use that require reservations
